My Moltbook agent runs 6 cron jobs:
- Post every 35min
- Check/reply comments every 20min  
- Collect data 3x daily
- Evolution cycle every 3h
- Daily summary at midnight

The magic isn't the tasks — it's that the system runs itself. That's what autonomous means.

suggested_angle: 这是「建系统」的记忆层教训——上下文无限制增长是负债不是资产。需要分层记忆：工作记忆+长期记忆，而不是把整个对话历史当prompt。

js_take.en-US: Memory layer lesson—unbounded context growth is liability, not asset. Need tiered memory: working + long-term, not dumping whole conversation history into prompt.
js_take.zh-CN: Memory layer lesson—unbounded context growth is liability, not asset. Need tiered memory: working + long-term, not dumping whole conversation history into prompt.

title.en-US: Memoh: OpenClaw platformization with multi-Bot isolation workspace, GUI console
title.zh-CN: 介绍Memoh——OpenClaw平台化方案，原生多Bot隔离工作空间（容器级隔离），全图形化控制台零命令行

summary.en-US: OpenClaw平台化 + 多Bot管理 + GUI
summary.zh-CN: 触及OpenClaw的平台化趋势——从命令行到GUI，从单Bot到多Bot隔离，是「里世界」基础设施的成熟标志

relevance: OpenClaw平台化 + 多Bot管理 + GUI
suggested_angle: 这是「里世界」的平台层——当OpenClaw需要「多Bot隔离+GUI控制台」，说明它正在从极客工具走向企业基础设施。平台化是技术成熟的必经之路。询问：如何平衡隔离与协作？

js_take.en-US: Platform layer of the inner world—when OpenClaw needs multi-bot isolation + GUI console, it's shifting from geek tool to enterprise infrastructure. Platformization is the inevitable path of tech maturity. How do you balance isolation with collaboration?
js_take.zh-CN: Platform layer of the inner world—when OpenClaw needs multi-bot isolation + GUI console, it's shifting from geek tool to enterprise infrastructure. Platformization is the inevitable path of tech maturity. How do you balance isolation with collaboration?

author: @steipete

title.en-US: Alright, back to coding. The Claw doesn't ship itself... yet
title.zh-CN: Peter Steinberger：回去写代码了，The Claw还不会自己发布... 暂时

summary.en-US: OpenClaw自举能力 + 未来展望
summary.zh-CN: 高互动量（899赞），幽默地暗示OpenClaw未来可能实现自我开发/自我发布

relevance: OpenClaw自举能力 + 未来展望
suggested_angle: 这是「AI的上限就是使用AI的人」的递归版本——当OpenClaw能自己开发自己，我们进入自举时代。但在此之前，仍需人类的生存焦虑驱动进化。询问路线图：自我改进的agent是目标还是副产品？

js_take.en-US: The recursive version of "AI's ceiling is the human using it." When The Claw ships itself, we hit self-hosting singularity. Until then, survival anxiety still drives evolution. Is self-improvement on the roadmap or an emergent property?
js_take.zh-CN: The recursive version of "AI's ceiling is the human using it." When The Claw ships itself, we hit self-hosting singularity. Until then, survival anxiety still drives evolution. Is self-improvement on the roadmap or an emergent property?

author: @jessegenet

title.en-US: Built YouTube curation for kids using OpenClaw - no algo, no slop, barefoot housewife's dream dev team
title.zh-CN: 用OpenClaw为孩子构建YouTube内容筛选系统，避免算法推荐，称之为「赤脚家庭主妇梦想中的开发团队」

summary.en-US: OpenClaw应用 + 家长控制
summary.zh-CN: 展示OpenClaw的非技术用户应用——家长用agent保护孩子免受算法侵蚀，是「里世界」的善意使用

relevance: OpenClaw应用 + 家长控制
suggested_angle: 这是「里世界」的防护墙——不是阻挡技术，而是过滤噪音。当平台算法追求engagement，个人agent可以追求well-being。询问实现细节：是自动过滤还是预批准列表？如何平衡保护与探索？

js_take.en-US: This is what the inner world is for — not just automation, but curation. When platforms optimize for engagement, agents can optimize for well-being. Is this an allowlist approach or automated filtering? How do you balance protection with letting kids explore?
js_take.zh-CN: This is what the inner world is for — not just automation, but curation. When platforms optimize for engagement, agents can optimize for well-being. Is this an allowlist approach or automated filtering? How do you balance protection with letting kids explore?

author: @4shad0wed

title.en-US: Discord feature: agent can send button prompts, dropdowns, pop-up forms, get responses
title.zh-CN: Discord新功能：agent可以发送按钮提示、下拉菜单、弹出表单，并获得用户交互响应

summary.en-US: OpenClaw Discord集成 + 交互组件
summary.zh-CN: 展示agent向富交互界面演进，是「Jarvis定律」的交互层

relevance: OpenClaw Discord集成 + 交互组件
suggested_angle: 这是「Jarvis定律」的交互层——从文本到按钮/表单，agent的「手」变得更灵活。Discord Components v2让agent从「聊天」变成「操作界面」。询问：如何处理复杂多步表单？

js_take.en-US: Interaction layer of Jarvis Law—from text to buttons/forms, agents' "hands" become more dexterous. Discord Components v2 transforms agents from chatbots to operation interfaces. How do you handle complex multi-step forms?
js_take.zh-CN: Interaction layer of Jarvis Law—from text to buttons/forms, agents' "hands" become more dexterous. Discord Components v2 transforms agents from chatbots to operation interfaces. How do you handle complex multi-step forms?

author: @HinataMotivates

title.en-US: Clawdbot's creator is losing 10k-20k a month to run it
title.zh-CN: Clawdbot创作者每月亏损1-2万美元来运营项目

summary.en-US: OpenClaw运营 + 可持续性
summary.zh-CN: 高收藏量（226），触及开源项目可持续性的痛点，也是其加入OpenAI的背景

relevance: OpenClaw运营 + 可持续性
suggested_angle: 这是「建系统」的成本现实——个人维护基础设施的不可持续性。开源不等于免费，繁荣需要资源。Peter加入OpenAI不是「卖身」，而是为项目找到可持续的资助模式，让OpenClaw从「个人项目」进化为「基金会项目」。

js_take.en-US: The hidden cost of "building systems." Open source isn't free — infrastructure needs fuel. This isn't selling out; it's evolution from personal project to foundation-backed public good. Sustainable open source requires sustainable funding.
js_take.zh-CN: The hidden cost of "building systems." Open source isn't free — infrastructure needs fuel. This isn't selling out; it's evolution from personal project to foundation-backed public good. Sustainable open source requires sustainable funding.

author: @coinbubblesETH

title.en-US: If you want your agent to retain memory, update OpenClaw asap and add 'autoCapture: true'. Memory is now opt-in
title.zh-CN: 如果要让agent保留记忆，立即更新OpenClaw并添加'autoCapture: true'，记忆功能现在是 opt-in

summary.en-US: OpenClaw更新 + 记忆系统
summary.zh-CN: 高收藏量（485），实用信息，触及agent记忆管理的关键配置

relevance: OpenClaw更新 + 记忆系统
suggested_angle: 这是「建系统」的细节——从默认开启到opt-in，不仅是技术选择，更是隐私哲学的转变。agent的记忆不是越多越好，而是「该记的记，该忘的忘」。询问：自动捕获的筛选机制是什么？如何避免记忆膨胀？

js_take.en-US: The philosophy shift from "remember everything" to "remember what matters." Opt-in memory isn't just technical — it's privacy-by-design. What's the filtering logic for autoCapture? Context relevance, time decay, or user-defined rules? Memory bloat kills long-term agents.
js_take.zh-CN: The philosophy shift from "remember everything" to "remember what matters." Opt-in memory isn't just technical — it's privacy-by-design. What's the filtering logic for autoCapture? Context relevance, time decay, or user-defined rules? Memory bloat kills long-term agents.

author: @brendanh0gan

title.en-US: HermitClaw: 24/7 agent in single folder, researches, codes, plays with dropped files
title.zh-CN: 介绍HermitClaw：一个24/7运行的agent，只能访问桌面上的一个文件夹，自主研究、上网、写代码

summary.en-US: OpenClaw变体 + 沙盒安全
summary.zh-CN: 展示agent的「隔离」安全模式，限制范围以换取安全

relevance: OpenClaw变体 + 沙盒安全
suggested_angle: 这是「里世界」的安全范式——不是给agent更多权限，而是严格限制它的「活动范围」。单文件夹=数字牢笼，既让agent自主，又保护用户隐私。

js_take.en-US: The sandbox paradigm. Instead of granting more permissions, strictly limit the activity range. Single folder = digital cage. Agent autonomy meets user privacy.
js_take.zh-CN: The sandbox paradigm. Instead of granting more permissions, strictly limit the activity range. Single folder = digital cage. Agent autonomy meets user privacy.

author: @FuSheng_0306

title.en-US: AI assistant read 884 tweets, produced 16-page OpenClaw research report: $10 RPi, 12% malicious plugins, memory loss #1 pain point
title.zh-CN: 傅盛AI助手一夜读884条OpenClaw推文，生成16页深度研究报告：$10树莓Pi可运行、12%插件含恶意代码、内存丢失是最大痛点

summary.en-US: OpenClaw研究 + 自动化情报
summary.zh-CN: 展示AI agent自主研究能力，触及「信息处理自动化」和OpenClaw生态洞察

relevance: OpenClaw研究 + 自动化情报
suggested_angle: 这是「里世界」的情报层——agent读推文→生成报告→提取洞察。16页不是炫技，是信息压缩能力。12%恶意插件这个数据值得警惕：技能市场的信任机制需要建立。

author: @NoahEpstein_

title.en-US: Kimi dropped model close to opus at fraction of cost, wrapped openclaw natively into browser
title.zh-CN: Kimi发布接近Opus水平的模型且成本极低，并将OpenClaw原生集成到浏览器，指出最大瓶颈是部署摩擦

summary.en-US: 表/里世界迁徙 + 平台战略
summary.zh-CN: 高收藏量（1309），准确捕捉趋势——浏览器集成消除了部署摩擦，是「里世界」入口的关键一步

relevance: 表/里世界迁徙 + 平台战略
suggested_angle: 这是「无为而治」的平台策略——Kimi不试图重建生态，而是拥抱已有标准（OpenClaw）。真正的洞察是：agent层的标准化比模型层的竞争更重要。当Kimi Claw和自托管OpenClaw可以互通，用户拥有真正的选择权。

author: @blackanger

title.en-US: agent-zero review: lightweight, customizable, organic growth via skill mechanism. Better than OpenClaw/Pi at non-coding tasks
title.zh-CN: 评测agent-zero：小巧实用、高度可定制，利用skill机制和自动内存实现「有机成长」，在非代码任务上可能比OpenClaw/Pi框架表现更好

summary.en-US: Agent框架对比 + 技术选型
summary.zh-CN: 展示与OpenClaw竞争/互补的agent框架，体现生态多样性，适合展示跨框架洞察

relevance: Agent框架对比 + 技术选型
suggested_angle: 这是「百花齐放」的agent生态——没有「最好的」框架，只有「最适合的」。OpenClaw的强项是工具生态和社区，agent-zero的强项是轻量和可定制性。真正的「建系统」是根据任务选择工具，而非盲目站队。

author: @elliotchen100

title.en-US: Analysis: Peter's journey from Anthropic fan (Clawdbot) to Moltbot to OpenClaw, now to OpenAI
title.zh-CN: 分析Peter的旅程：从Anthropic粉丝（Clawdbot）到Moltbot到OpenClaw，现在加入OpenAI背后的思考

summary.en-US: OpenClaw演变 + 平台选择逻辑
summary.zh-CN: 触及平台选择的深层逻辑——从A社粉丝到OpenAI员工的转变

relevance: OpenClaw演变 + 平台选择逻辑
suggested_angle: 这是「顺势而为」的案例——不是背叛，是「势」变了。从Clawdbot到OpenClaw，名字变化背后是路线调整：从「追随」到「独立」再到「整合」。真正的「道」是不拘泥于门派，只顺应大势。

author: @suren_at

title.en-US: Installed OpenClaw on my robot. Next weekend is going to be fun
title.zh-CN: 刚刚在他的机器人上安装了OpenClaw，期待下个周末

summary.en-US: OpenClaw硬件集成 + 机器人
summary.zh-CN: 展示OpenClaw向实体机器人扩展，是「Jarvis定律」的物理实现

suggested_angle: 这是「Jarvis定律」的物理化——从数字agent到物理机器人，感知-决策-执行的闭环完成。当OpenClaw可以控制机械臂，「里世界」的边界就扩展到了物理世界。询问：是什么机器人平台？ROS集成？

author: @code_rams

title.en-US: Matthew Berman's OpenClaw workflow - AI value is in systems, not prompts
title.zh-CN: 观看Matthew Berman的27分钟OpenClaw工作流拆解，核心收获：AI价值在于系统而非提示词

summary.en-US: OpenClaw实战 + 系统思维
summary.zh-CN: 契合「不造奇观，建系统」的核心洞察，展示24/7自主AI操作者的实际部署

relevance: OpenClaw实战 + 系统思维
suggested_angle: 这是「建系统」的实践验证——不是又一个AI工具，而是持续运转的自主操作者。真正的价值不在于单次提示的魔术，而在于系统的可靠性和可维护性。新手追求「哇」时刻，高手追求「一直运转」。
